title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging       The town of Plains has one  location that offers lodging, the Plains Historic Inn and Antiques Mall.        The Plains Inn and Antiques Mall is located in downtown Plains. Courtesy of PLAINS INNS AND ANTIQUES MALL.  Plains Historic Inn & Antiques Mall located on Main Street in Plains, invites you to step back in time and enjoy the accommodations of one of seven period suites, authentically furnished from the 1920s to 1980s -"every room a history lesson." Each suite includes a private bath, cable TV, a smoke-free environment, and meets accessibility standards. Guests enjoy exclusive use of the common room and balcony overlooking the historic square that provides a place for relaxation. Every morning wake up to a complimentary continental breakfast. Below the Inn, enjoy shopping for antiques in the mall featuring display cases and over 25 booths.      For more lodging information, please contact the Americus-Sumter County Tourism Council or the Sumter County Chamber of Commerce.
